sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import close from '../images/close.png' import PhoneInput from 'react-phone-input-2' import 'react-phone-input-2/lib/style.css' import facebook from '../images/facebook.png' import google from '../images/google.png' import apple from '../images/apple.png' import mail from '../images/mail.png' export const Signup = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(false) return (

Log in or sign up

Welcome to Airbnb.

{email ? : }

We will confirm your phone number by phone or text. Regular text messaging and data rates apply. privacy policy

or

Continue with Facebook

Continue with Google

Continue with Apple

setEmail(true)} className='cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-200 ml-5 w-11/12 p-3 mt-4 flex items-center border border-spacing-1 rounded-lg border-black'>

Continue with Email

); } export default Signup;
